name: part_010
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY1】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony hololive STAGE1【チラ見せ】 [IKkSNj5uN6I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Multiple hololive members performing 'Color Rise' as the opening group song for the 'Harmony' stage.
Stage transition with light effects and intro animation for the next performer.
Hakui Koyori performing her solo song 'WAO!!' on stage.

subtitles.original: 遠い未来へと
subtitles.english: To the distant future

subtitles.original: 強く願い込め巻いた
subtitles.english: Wrapping it with a strong wish

subtitles.original: 希望の風を吹かせては
subtitles.english: Letting the wind of hope blow

subtitles.original: 理想の花びら 祈る明日の空
subtitles.english: Petals of ideals, praying to tomorrow's sky

subtitles.original: 何百億も光る星みたいに
subtitles.english: Like hundreds of billions of shining stars

subtitles.original: ずっとずっと終わらないから
subtitles.english: Because it will never, ever end

subtitles.original: この笑顔が一番強く抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Embrace this smile the most strongly

subtitles.original: 今未来にこの手伸ばしてゆくから
subtitles.english: Now I'll reach my hand out to the future

subtitles.original: 時に転んでも空を見上げよう
subtitles.english: Even if we fall sometimes, let's look up at the sky

subtitles.original: 笑い日々を刻んでゆく
subtitles.english: Carving our laughing days

subtitles.original: 次の夢を掴み取るって
subtitles.english: That I'll grasp the next dream

subtitles.original: 約束するから
subtitles.english: Because I promise

subtitles.original: 踏み出そうここから
subtitles.english: Let's step forward from here

subtitles.original: We are,
subtitles.english: We are,

subtitles.original: With you
subtitles.english: With you

subtitles.original: We are,
subtitles.english: We are,

subtitles.original: With you
subtitles.english: With you

subtitles.original: 同じ未来を見ていたい
subtitles.english: I want to see the same future

subtitles.original: あの夢手にしたい
subtitles.english: I want to make that dream mine

subtitles.original: We are, with you.
subtitles.english: We are, with you.

subtitles.original: Catch the moment.
subtitles.english: Catch the moment.

subtitles.original: 降り注いだ奇跡の中へ
subtitles.english: Into the miracle that poured down

subtitles.original: その先まで続く空に紛れたら
subtitles.english: If we get lost in the sky that continues beyond that

subtitles.original: 君の場所と今を繋げたくて
subtitles.english: I want to connect your place and the present

subtitles.original: あの涙が今の僕らを繋げて
subtitles.english: Those tears connect us now

subtitles.original: この心に君のカケラがいるから
subtitles.english: Because there's a piece of you in this heart

subtitles.original: 強くなくてもいい今の光を
subtitles.english: It's okay not to be strong, take this light now

subtitles.original: もっと集め空に放つ
subtitles.english: Gather it more and release it into the sky

subtitles.original: この奇跡を僕らでそっと輝かせるから
subtitles.english: Because we'll make this miracle shine gently

subtitles.original: 咲かせようここから
subtitles.english: Let's make it bloom from here

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because you're not alone

subtitles.original: へひっ！ ふふっ！
subtitles.english: Hehi! Fufu!

subtitles.original: 幕張メッセの、みんなの脳髄に、アッシュッシュしちゃうぞー！
subtitles.english: I'm going to inject all of your brains here at Makuhari Messe!

subtitles.original: 実験だ！実験だ！ジュケジュケ実験だ！
subtitles.english: It's an experiment! It's an experiment! A juke-juke experiment!

subtitles.original: 実験だ！実験だ！うわーっ！実験だ！
subtitles.english: It's an experiment! It's an experiment! Waaah! It's an experiment!

subtitles.original: テケテケテケ！対決 解決 叙情中！
subtitles.english: Teke-teke-teke! Confrontation, resolution, lyrical status!

subtitles.original: 酔っ払って飛び出てパピプペポ！
subtitles.english: Getting drunk and popping out, pa-pi-pu-pe-po!

subtitles.original: ケショケショケショ！化粧 アテンション プリーズ！
subtitles.english: Kesho-kesho-kesho! Makeup, attention please!

subtitles.original: ダメダメだっ！自棄糞しちゃうよ！
subtitles.english: It's no good! I'm going to get desperate!

subtitles.original: マヨって ダメダメ マヨって サイレンス
subtitles.english: Mayo-ing is no good, Mayo-ing silence

subtitles.original: マヨって 呪文は マヨマヨジュシュシュ！
subtitles.english: The Mayo-ing spell is Mayo-Mayo-ju-shu-shu!

subtitles.original: コヨ火のデザート 恋するハッピー
subtitles.english: Koyo-fire dessert, falling in love happy

subtitles.original: コヨ火に 焼かれて 恋い焦がれ！
subtitles.english: Burned by the Koyo-fire, pining for love!

subtitles.original: サイン コサイン タンジェント！ 事件勃発 ダイレクト！
subtitles.english: Sine, Cosine, Tangent! Direct outbreak of an incident!

subtitles.original: ハクいイノセンス！ 全身全霊 ダーリン！
subtitles.english: White innocence! With all my soul, darling!

subtitles.original: 天才！ 天才！ 天才！ とんでもなくエナイ！
subtitles.english: Genius! Genius! Genius! Unbelievably enough!

subtitles.original: 羽目を外して 褒めてください！
subtitles.english: Let loose and please praise me!

subtitles.original: 最高！ 最高！ 最高！ 飛んでるって よっしゃ！
subtitles.english: Best! Best! Best! It's flying, alright!

subtitles.original: 打ちのめすわ 三三七拍子！
subtitles.english: I'll knock you out with a 3-3-7 beat!

subtitles.original: 感覚は爆発さ！ パチピポポ！
subtitles.english: My senses are exploding! Pachi-pipo-po!

subtitles.original: 間違えて ドカン！ 予定通りよ この計算通り！
subtitles.english: Mistake it and bang! It's just as planned, just as calculated!

subtitles.original: 実験だ！実験だ！ジュケジュケ実験だ！
subtitles.english: It's an experiment! It's an experiment! A juke-juke experiment!

subtitles.original: 実験だ！実験だ！うわーっ！実験だ！
subtitles.english: It's an experiment! It's an experiment! Waaah! It's an experiment!

subtitles.original: 実験だ！実験だ！ジュケジュケ実験だ！ 実験だ！実験だ！実験だー！
subtitles.english: It's an experiment! It's an experiment! Juke-juke experiment! Experiment! Experiment! It's an experiment!

subtitles.original: さーて、早速始めましょう！
subtitles.english: Now then, let's get started right away!

subtitles.original: これより行う、天才マッドサイエンティバレー！
subtitles.english: From here on, the genius mad scienti-valley!

subtitles.original: 世にも奇妙なスンバラスィ大実験！
subtitles.english: A very strange and wonderful big experiment!

subtitles.original: 良コンソメは雲のラボだと飛び
subtitles.english: Good consommé flies as a cloud lab

subtitles.original: ドキドキワクワク胸打つリズム
subtitles.english: A heart-pounding and exciting rhythm
